meanings: (맞서 이겨 내다) match, (어려운 상황 등을) cope with

vlive.korean: 이거 스포 당하면 큰일인데 - 진짜 나 스포하면... 그거는 진짜... It's not good to be given spoilers. - If someone does that to me..then... 듣기 View video NCT : 💚드림💚배불러요!
vlive.english: It's not good to be given spoilers. - If someone does that to me..then...

vlive.korean: 협박이라도 당하면? If they got threatened? 듣기 View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : 악동탐정스 시즌2 공식티저
캡처 당하면 또 안 된다. We can't have a bad screenshot. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 사라진 기럭지😩
vlive.english: We can't have a bad screenshot.

vlive.korean: 내가 강퇴 당하면 어떡하지 이러다가? What if I'm kicked out from the room? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 일어남
vlive.english: What if I'm kicked out from the room?

vlive.korean: '학교에서 따돌림 당하면 어떻게 할까요?' "What should you do if you're being ostracized at school"? 듣기 View video Wanna One : 관린이 심심하다😎
vlive.english: "What should you do if you're being ostracized at school"?

examples.korean: You don't know how such a thing makes you feel. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그런 일을 당하면 기분이 어떻다는 걸 넌 몰라. Neungyule
examples.english: You don't know how such a thing makes you feel. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If a laptop with the LoJack system is stolen, the laptop sends a message to the LoJack company. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 로잭 시스템이 있는 랩탑 컴퓨터가 도난 당하면, 랩탑 컴퓨터는 로잭 업체에 메시지를 전달한다. Neungyule
examples.english: If a laptop with the LoJack system is stolen, the laptop sends a message to the LoJack company. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: When a person has been excessively abused, they are going to be relying on basic survival senses. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 어떤 사람이 과도하게 폭행을 당하면, 그들은 기본 생존 욕구에 의존하게 된다. Neungyule
examples.english: When a person has been excessively abused, they are going to be relying on basic survival senses. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Don't go out at night. Don't be a statistic. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 밤에는 밖에 나가지 마라. 사고라도 당하면 안되니까. Neungyule
examples.english: Don't go out at night. Don't be a statistic. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: At least a slaughter like that makes it easier to admit defeat. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 적어도 그같은 대패를 당하면 패배를 받아들이기가 쉬운데 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: At least a slaughter like that makes it easier to admit defeat. Add to Wordbook
